title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
content: Hi guys this is very sad news that finally the popular Crypto exchange Bittrex Global has decided to shut down their operations. As they said on 4th December 2023 All trading activity will be disabled on Bittrex Global. So if you still have some funds there you should withdraw it as soon as possible before the deadline. More details are here: https://bittrexglobal.com/

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: There have been up to three threads already discussing this topic.Check “exchanges” board to see them although some of them have been locked by moderator so I’d suggest you do the same to this one. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474913.msg63196449#msg63196449

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: This is the fourth.Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 11:25:50 AMThis is the third thread about this, the first was created more than 12 hours ago. Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 09:56:15 AMBittrex is Closing DownThe best would be to lock this thread. I am surprised that the original one was on the right board which is the exchanges board, but people are not posting there.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 05:04:43 PMQuote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 11:25:50 AMThis is the third thread about this, the first was created more than 12 hours ago. Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 09:56:15 AMBittrex is Closing DownThe best would be to lock this thread. I am surprised that the original one was on the right board which is the exchanges board, but people are not posting there.Auch, I searched here before posting and saw no thread in 2 pages. Ok, I am locking this. But The treaders should be alerted by here also. I will lock and bump it again to alert.  Thanks
